title: My Revision Notes WJEC History Route A, 2E [PDF][StormRG]
description:
TITLE/EDITION My Revision Notes: WJEC History Route A Second Edition
By: R. Paul Evans
Print Length: 128 pages
Publisher: Hodder Education; 2nd Revised edition edition (August 29, 2014)
Language: English
ASIN: B00LT8YG0M
NOTE: This is the standalone ebook and may not include access codes that come packaged with the bound book

___________________________________________________________________________________


New edition for the 2013 Specification.


Unlock your full potential with these revision guides which focus on the key content and skills you need to know.

With My Revision Notes for WJEC GCSE History Route A you can:
- Take control of your revision: plan and focus on the areas you need to revise, with content summaries and commentary from author R. Paul Evans.
- Show you fully understand key topics by using specific examples to add depth to your knowledge of historical issues
- Apply history terms accurately with the help of definitions and key words on all topics
- Improve your skills to tackle specific exam questions - such as source evaluation, describe, explain why and essay questions - with self-testing and exam-style questions and answers

Units covered:
- Russia in Transition 1905-1924
- The USA, a Nation of Contrasts, 1910-1929
- Germany in transition 1919-1947
- The Development of the USA, 1930-2000
